metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3518 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
The networkstatus_parse_vote_from_string function in routerparse.c in Tor before 0.2.2.38 does not properly handle an invalid flavor name, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read and daemon crash) via a crafted (1) vote document or (2) consensus document.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3518` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tor - 0.2.3.22-rc-1
tor-geoipdb - 0.2.3.22-rc-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> may have been introduced in 0.2.2.6-alpha

criterions.comment: tor package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.2.3.22-rc-1').
